sentence.idiomatic: I have to go to the office tomorrow to sign a contract.
I signed a two year contract with him.
When does your contract expire?
The term of this contract is five years.
The delivery deadline date is approaching quickly.
Your bill is overdue, yesterday was the deadline to submit payment.
I've heard that his wages are very high.
My salary is often not enough to live on.
How much is your monthly salary?
The information provided on this website is very useful.
This restaurant provides tea for free.
You supply the funds, we supply the facilities--how about that?
The accommodations for the guests have already been arranged.
The company solved my accommodation problem for me.
Last time we went to Beijing, we couldn't even find a place to stay.
Arranging a tourist visa is easier.
I've arranged my visa for going to France.
When can you get your visa arranged by?
If you don't have a receipt you can't get reimbursed.
Expenses resulting from entertaining clients can be reimbursed.
Does your company reimburse fees for taxi fares?
I want to reserve a return plane ticket from Shanghai to Beijing.
The past few days, every day he's been going back and forth between the hospital and home.
Lately business has been pretty good. Every day I have to go back and forth to the city several times.
I'm giving you one week to consider.
I need to think about it for a while; I can't give you an immediate answer.
The terms he is giving you are so good, what else do you need to consider?
Today we are going talk about your contract. The term of the contract is for one year.
OK. That is no problem.
Compensation for teachers is 7,000 per month.
Oh. Is there a place to live at the school?
The school provides accommodation, and it is free.
Now what do I do about my visa?
The school will arrange a work visa for you. You don't have to worry about that. Do you have any other questions?
Can the school reimburse me for my return plane ticket?
Yes, but you must work for a full year.
Oh. What kind of vacation time do I get?
All the Chinese holidays you will get off. Plus you can study Chinese for free here. Not bad, hey?
Pretty good. But I still need to think it over for a while.
